description: 学习间接引语的基础用法：转述别人的话

basic_rules: 间接引语用来转述别人的话
直接引语变为间接引语时，时态要相应变化
usage_cases: 转述陈述句：He said, "I am happy." → He said (that) he was happy.
转述疑问句：He asked, "Are you happy?" → He asked if/whether I was happy.
转述祈使句：He said, "Please help me." → He asked me to help him.
common_errors: He said that he is happy. (错误) → He said that he was happy. (正确)
He asked if I am happy. (错误) → He asked if I was happy. (正确)
He said that he will come. (错误) → He said that he would come. (正确)
usage_tips: 间接引语中时态要相应变化

present_to_past: He said, "I am happy." → He said that he was happy.
She said, "I like apples." → She said that she liked apples.
He said, "I have a car." → He said that he had a car.
She said, "I can swim." → She said that she could swim.
He said, "I will come." → He said that he would come.
past_to_past_perfect: He said, "I went to school." → He said that he had gone to school.
She said, "I saw a movie." → She said that she had seen a movie.
He said, "I finished my homework." → He said that he had finished his homework.
She said, "I bought a book." → She said that she had bought a book.
He said, "I played football." → He said that he had played football.
questions: He asked, "Are you happy?" → He asked if I was happy.
She asked, "Do you like apples?" → She asked if I liked apples.
He asked, "Can you swim?" → He asked if I could swim.
She asked, "Will you come?" → She asked if I would come.
He asked, "Have you finished?" → He asked if I had finished.
